extendedInfo.description: **SALE! 75% off on all expansions! Hurry up and get your expansions now at 75% discounted price for a very limited time!**Stay tuned for an upcoming update!!Welcome to Millionaire City, where you can become a powerhouse CEO and watch the money roll in all from the convenience Build your monopoly from the ground up by creating luxurious houses.Officially supported handsets: Samsung Galaxy Tab(P1000),Samsung Galaxy S(I9000),HTC Desire,HTC Nexus One,HTC Incredible,Motorola Droid,Droid2, Droid X. Crowded commercial skyscrapers, gorgeous decorations and unique world wonders. Make smart investments, take risks, care for your properties, and watch your company grow!Game features:â¢Earn your riches as you build your company from the ground up as the CEOâ¢Purchase property, build houses, and sign contracts to help your company growâ¢Complete missions to earn more and get hours of entertainmentâ¢Discover a wide range of luxurious items in the marketplaceâ¢Fun and easy controlsâ¢Count your money as you listen to golden musicKeywordsMillionaireCityBuildingsimsimulationhitactionfunmoneyrichdollarrentsocialimprovegolddchocdigitalchocolate

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Hmm good game i completed all the mission. The 4 star is due to lack of something like more building rotation of building. The building is only stand one direction need to be improvement. Plz update it. And also need more mission.
reviews.author: Sheshank Sahu

reviews.comment: This game was so addictive on fb...didnt lag on fb or nothing..but the mobile version is so badd and why is the scrolling so slow on mobile version? Dont say its my phone..i have a note ii...second WHY DONT U MAKE MORE MISSIONS??
reviews.author: Issam A.F

reviews.title: Decorations
reviews.comment: When you add a lot of decorations sometimes the rent goes down instead of up like it should? Why is that please fix this bug an I\'d up the 2 stars to 4
reviews.author: Andrew McLeod

reviews.title: Force Close after a bit
reviews.comment: A good game but after a few 3 min contracts it force closes but everything else is fine.If u fix i will give u five stars.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs updates fast
reviews.comment: No where near as good as on Facebook. Needs more of everything, missions are crap as you only get like one new mission every few levels. Overall mite get rid of the app just a waste of space
reviews.author: Jack Whitehead

reviews.title: Was better on fb.
reviews.comment: Had more bonuses. City and cash built up faster.
reviews.author: E Sheets

reviews.title: Millionaire City
reviews.comment: It is a bit slow but ok.
reviews.author: Gary Lisby

reviews.title: Terrible!
reviews.comment: Constantly saying it has stopped and when you go back onto it you notice that half the things you\'ve done before the error have been undone! Facebook version is hell of a lot better.
reviews.author: Kimberley Craigie

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: Facebook\'s version was fun this gets boring after a while! Nothing new from when I started... needs more houses, decorations, missions and some more wonders would be nice! Please make a update to make it better!
reviews.author: Andrew Williams

reviews.title: It never update and it\'s been 2 year\'s now!
reviews.comment: I like da game but ii wanna update da game for more thing!
reviews.author: Terrell Tutt

reviews.title: Love this game.
reviews.comment: Had this game for my LG enVTouch. Just as good, if not better on my Pantech Marauder!
reviews.author: Joella Brooks

reviews.title: Only one thing
reviews.comment: Iis there a way that you could visit other people\'s city. I always install at least 5 games to see wich one is the one that is my most favorite game. And I only have 1-5. And that 1 game is Enemy Lines. That is the only one I have. Just to add this game it needs a place to show something where I can visit peoples place. And where I can make it a city name. And myne will be called:Ninja\'s city. So just have those two new updates on the game. If it arlready will let you change your name, how do you do that???
reviews.author: Heather Bolhuis

reviews.comment: The game is fun but it steals money. I tried to buy 3 townhouses and all it did was freeze and stopped working and then when i started up again my money was gone and i didnt get the townhomes. They need to work on that.
reviews.author: K Buchanan

reviews.title: Cool n fun
reviews.comment: I like this game but can you fix when we buy buildings to make it large please it\'s hard to choose and can you make it like on Facebook and you will see the high rating
reviews.author: Tony Bou Sader

reviews.title: Expected SimCity. Got farmville
reviews.comment: Not fun. At all. Misleading.
reviews.author: Derek Hancock

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: Glichy and sluggish then when it works wants you to collect money almost immediately or you loose it! I HAVE A LIFE IM NOT SPENDING HOUR\'S WATCHING IT TO PLAY!
reviews.author: Daniel Clifton

reviews.comment: cool
reviews.author: yazan hammad

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Good game

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Liking this

reviews.title: Htc desire
reviews.comment: I cannot install it on my phone. Please help me :(
